target_audience: Tech professionals and content creators aged 30-50 seeking premium quality

products.product_description: Premium true wireless earbuds with adaptive noise cancellation, spatial audio, and 8-hour battery life per charge. Crystal-clear highs and deep, powerful bass in an ultra-compact design.
products.generation_prompt: premium true wireless earbuds in charging case with metallic finish, premium tech product photography, high-end audio aesthetic, luxury lifestyle, centered with lifestyle context, detailed close-up shots, negative space for branding, dramatic studio lighting with rim lights, metallic highlights, soft key light, minimalist modern setting, dark gradient, subtle texture, material quality visible (metal, leather), controls clearly shown, premium craftsmanship details

enhanced_generation.base_prompt: premium true wireless earbuds in charging case with metallic finish

composition.depth_of_field: shallow with sharp focus on product

lighting.rim_light: accent light highlighting metallic edges and curves

background.texture: glossy reflective surface with subtle texture

details.quality_indicators: sharp crisp edges, visible premium materials, precise manufacturing

enhanced_generation.negative_prompt: cheap plastic appearance, flat lighting, cluttered, low resolution

products.product_description: Professional-grade 15.6-inch 4K OLED portable monitor with USB-C connectivity, HDR10+ support, and ultra-slim 5mm design. Perfect for professionals on the go.
key_features: USB-C single cable power and video
products.generation_prompt: ultra-slim 15.6-inch 4K OLED portable monitor displaying vivid content, professional tech photography, modern display technology, sleek aesthetic, angled to show screen content and design, environmental context showing use case, soft studio lighting, screen content backlit, minimal reflections on screen, modern workspace, minimalist desk setup, neutral professional environment, screen content sharp and vivid, bezel detail visible, premium materials shown, ports/connectors clear

enhanced_generation.base_prompt: ultra-slim 15.6-inch 4K OLED portable monitor displaying vivid content

composition.primary_subject: portable monitor at elegant angle showing screen and design
composition.viewing_angle: 3/4 angle showing screen content and slim profile
composition.depth_of_field: medium DOF with screen and body in focus
composition.negative_space: space above and beside for text elements

lighting.quality: professional studio lighting with screen backlit

details.texture_emphasis: premium aluminum finish, OLED screen quality
details.quality_indicators: sharp screen content, visible premium materials, precise engineering, professional color accuracy

enhanced_generation.negative_prompt: screen glare, blurry display content, cheap appearance, cluttered desk
